code: import React from'react';import Chart from'../Graphs/chart';import'./CoinPriceInfo.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var returnPriceData=function returnPriceData(){var priceData=[];while(priceData.length<6){var r=Math.floor(Math.random()*10000)+1;priceData.push(r);}console.log(priceData);var data={labels:labels,datasets:[{label:'Ethereum',backgroundColor:'rgb(0, 128, 0)',borderColor:'rgb(0, 128, 0)',data:priceData}]};return data;};var labels=['January','February','March','April','May','June'];var options={plugins:{legend:{display:false}},elements:{line:{tension:0.5}},scales:{x:{legend:{display:false},grid:{display:false}},y:{legend:{display:false},grid:{display:false}}}};function CoinPriceInfo(_ref){var coinPrice=_ref.coinPrice;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chart,{data:returnPriceData(),options:options}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{className:"Coin-price",children:["$ ",coinPrice," /-"]})]});}export default CoinPriceInfo;
